Articles.Content:
Today I watched Tomorrowland, A Disney Movie Inspired By The "Tomorrowland" From The Magic Kingdom In Disney World? I still don't know.

The rocket launches, then doing a "Sonic Boom" pushing it out into orbit. Like The Orion Ol' Boom.

Need A Team To Make This Possible.
I think replicate the look of the rocket is possible with parts. Just need someone with expendable time and 3D modelling skill. That boom would require more work, though possible too:
If it still works you could play around with this plugin for a sonic boom http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/28428-Orion-aka-Ol-Boom-boom
